item.title: Effects of Banning Content on the Structure of Online Hate Communities
item.description: Does banning stuff work? Even though the internet is renowned for being a cesspool of hate, a lot of media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Discord) have been cracking down on this kind of content by banning people or communities associated with certain movements. But there’s one big unanswered question: Is it working? In some cases, these communities backlash and have a hydra-like effect: cut off one hand and two more spring up in its place.
